org.aludratest.scheduler.impl

Class AludraTestMethodInvoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.scheduler.impl.AludraTestMethodInvoker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestInvoker

    public class AludraTestMethodInvoker
extends Object
implements TestInvoker
    Default TestInvoker implementation for AludraTest. First it calls the @Before methods, then the test method itself, then the @After methods, similar to the behavior familiar from JUnit.
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AludraTestMethodInvoker(AludraTestCase testObject, Method method, TestCaseData data, boolean deferredEvaluation)
      Constructor receiving values for all attributes of same name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AludraTestMethodInvoker

        public AludraTestMethodInvoker(AludraTestCase testObject,
                               Method method,
                               TestCaseData data,
                               boolean deferredEvaluation)
        Constructor receiving values for all attributes of same name.
        Parameters:
        testObject - the object on which to invoke the test method
        method - the test method to invoke
        data - The Test Case Data object carrying the arguments for execution.
        deferredEvaluation - If true, the test case data object will be asked for the arguments right before method invocation, otherwise, it will be asked now (in the constructor) for the arguments.

        Parameters:

      • getTestClass

        public Class<?> getTestClass()
        Description copied from interface: TestInvoker
        Returns the class which contains the test for execution, if any. This is for documentational purposes only, and null is permitted as return value if the test does not base on a class.
        Specified by:
        getTestClass in interface TestInvoker
        Returns:
        The class which contains the test for execution, or null if no class information is available for this test.
